001package io.jstach.jstachio.spi;
002
003import static io.jstach.jstachio.spi.Templates.sneakyThrow;
004import static io.jstach.jstachio.spi.Templates.validateEncoding;
005
006import io.jstach.jstachio.JStachio;
007import io.jstach.jstachio.Output;
008import io.jstach.jstachio.Output.EncodedOutput;
009import io.jstach.jstachio.Template;
010import io.jstach.jstachio.TemplateInfo;
011import io.jstach.jstachio.TemplateModel;
012import io.jstach.jstachio.spi.JStachioFilter.FilterChain;
013
014/**
015 * An abstract jstachio that just needs a {@link JStachioExtensions} container.
016 * <p>
017 * To extend just override {@link #extensions()}.
018 *
019 * @see JStachioExtensions
020 * @author agentgt
021 */
022public abstract class AbstractJStachio implements JStachio, JStachioExtensions.Provider {
023
024        /**
025         * Do nothing constructor
026         */
027        public AbstractJStachio() {
028
029        }
030
031        @Override
032        public <A extends Output<E>, E extends Exception> A execute(Object model, A appendable) throws E {
033                var t = _findTemplate(model);
034                return t.execute(model, appendable);
035        }
036
037        @Override
038        public <A extends EncodedOutput<E>, E extends Exception> A write(Object model, A appendable) throws E {
039                var t = _findTemplate(model);
040                validateEncoding(t, appendable);
041                return t.write(model, appendable);
042        }
043
044        /*
045         * IF YOU want this method to be not final please file a bug.
046         */
047        @Override
048        public final Template<Object> findTemplate(Object model) {
049                return _findTemplate(model);
050        }
051
052        /*
053         * IF YOU want this method protected (thus overrideable) please file a bug.
054         */
055        @SuppressWarnings({ "rawtypes", "unchecked" })
056        private Template<Object> _findTemplate(Object model) {
057                TemplateInfo template;
058                if (model instanceof TemplateModel te) {
059                        /*
060                         * TemplateExecutables can execute on themselves.
061                         */
062                        template = te.template();
063                }
064                else {
065                        template = template(model.getClass());
066                }
067                var filter = loadFilter(model, template);
068                Template t = FilterChain.toTemplate(filter, template);
069                return t;
070        }
071
072        /**
073         * Loads the filter and checks if it can process the model and template.
074         * @param model to render
075         * @param template loaded by {@link #template(Class)}
076         * @return filter chain that can process model
077         */
078        protected final FilterChain loadFilter(Object model, TemplateInfo template) {
079                var filter = FilterChain.of(extensions().getFilter(), template);
080                if (filter.isBroken(model)) {
081                        boolean isReflectiveTemplate = Templates.isReflectionTemplate(template);
082                        final String ind = "\n\t";
083                        String reason = "";
084                        if (isReflectiveTemplate) {
085                                reason = " This is usually because the template "
086                                                + "has not been compiled and reflection based rendering is not available.";
087                        }
088                        throw new BrokenFilterException( //
089                                        "Filter chain unable to process template/model." + reason //
090                                                        + ind + "template: \"" + template.description() + "\"" //
091                                                        + ind + "model type: \"" + model.getClass() + "\"" //
092                                                        + ind + "reflection used: \"" + isReflectiveTemplate + "\"");
093                }
094                return filter;
095        }
096
097        /*
098         * IF YOU want this method to be not final please file a bug.
099         */
100        @Override
101        public final boolean supportsType(Class<?> modelType) {
102                if (TemplateModel.class.isAssignableFrom(modelType)) {
103                        return true;
104                }
105                return extensions().getTemplateFinder().supportsType(modelType);
106        }
107
108        /**
109         * Finds the template by model class wrapping any exceptions.
110         * @param modelType the class of the model.
111         * @return found template never <code>null</code>.
112         */
113        protected TemplateInfo template(Class<?> modelType) {
114                try {
115                        return extensions().getTemplateFinder().findTemplate(modelType);
116                }
117                catch (Exception e) {
118                        sneakyThrow(e);
119                        throw new RuntimeException(e);
120                }
121        }
122
123}
124
125class DefaultJStachio extends AbstractJStachio {
126
127        private final JStachioExtensions extensions;
128
129        public DefaultJStachio(JStachioExtensions extensions) {
130                super();
131                this.extensions = extensions;
132        }
133
134        @Override
135        public JStachioExtensions extensions() {
136                return this.extensions;
137        }
138
139}
